s: In 2015, Tokyo-3 is under attack from “Angels”, extraordinary beings that possess various special abilities. Multipurpose Humanoid Decisive Weapon Evangelion is the only method to counter these Angels, and Shinji Ikari is chosen as its pilot. The battle for the fate of humankind has begun.

s: NEON GENESIS EVANGELION is widely acclaimed as the greatest anime series of all time. Now on the occasion of its 10th Anniversary, ADV Films is pleased to offer a special limited edition set to commemorate this watershed moment in anime's history.
